sourcesContent:
import panagiotisImg from '../assets/panagiotis.jpg'
import iliasImg from '../assets/ilias.jpg'
import antonisImg from '../assets/antonis.jpg'
import giorgosImg from '../assets/giorgos.jpg'
import vaggelisImg from '../assets/vaggelis.jpg'
import sotirisImg from '../assets/sotiris.jpg'

export const cofounders = [
  {
    name: 'Panagiotis Kotsalis',
    role: 'Executive Director',
    image: panagiotisImg,
    bio: `Panagiotis has valuable experience in active citizenship, leadership, and European citizenship through youth councils and his role as president of AHEPA Youth. He has promoted civic engagement and intercultural dialogue via initiatives, media campaigns, and his work in sports as an ambassador of Olympism. His leadership continues to inspire youth through values of unity and cooperation.`
  },
  {
    name: 'Ilias Kalantzis',
    role: 'Co-Founder',
    image: iliasImg,
    bio: `Ilias is a Business Management graduate and Bodossaki Scholar currently pursuing a master's in finance at ESSEC Business School. He has led youth groups in camps, participated in Erasmus+ projects across Europe, and received awards in entrepreneurship and presentations. Ilias blends innovation, teamwork, and passion for cross-cultural collaboration.`
  },
  {
    name: 'Antonis Kalantzis',
    role: 'Co-Founder',
    image: antonisImg,
    bio: `Antonis is an IT and Telecommunications student with experience teaching youth to combine coding and gaming. With expertise in AI and machine learning, he co-founded Odyssey of Wisdom to inspire youth through technology. His Erasmus+ journey in the Basque Country motivated him to champion intercultural collaboration through digital innovation.`
  },
  {
    name: 'Giorgos Tsitlakidis',
    role: 'Project Manager',
    image: giorgosImg,
    bio: `Giorgos holds a Mathematics degree and is studying Computer Science. After discovering Erasmus+ at 22, he dove into youth exchanges and training courses, developing soft skills and a passion for facilitating his own projects. As a math teacher and project leader, he empowers others through education and cultural awareness.`
  },
  {
    name: 'Vaggelis Argyropoulos',
    role: 'Co-Founder',
    image: vaggelisImg,
    bio: `Vaggelis is a computer science student at the University of Athens, soon studying at Sapienza University in Rome. His interests include AI, algorithms, and web development. He values learning through travel and cross-cultural exchange, which shape how he collaborates and applies his technical knowledge across borders.`
  }
]
